conversations.content: Who gave the speech on June 3, 2024, marking the 35th anniversary of Imam Khomeini’s demise?
Imam Khamenei, Leader of the Islamic Revolution, gave the speech on June 3, 2024, marking the 35th anniversary of Imam Khomeini’s demise.
Where was the ceremony held to mark the 35th anniversary of Imam Khomeini’s demise?
The ceremony was held in the Mausoleum of Imam Khomeini.
What was the purpose of the annual gathering according to Imam Khamenei?

The purpose of the annual gathering was to honor Imam Khomeini’s memory and to apply his teachings towards the administration and progress of the country, as well as the realization of the Revolution’s objectives.
What did Imam Khamenei emphasize about the Palestinian issue in the thoughts and opinions of the late Imam Khomeini?

Imam Khamenei emphasized the importance of the Palestinian issue in the thoughts and opinions of the late Imam Khomeini, including the rejection of reliance on so-called peace negotiations, the active participation of the Palestinian people in taking back their rights, as well as all nations’ help, especially that of the Muslim nations for the Palestinian people.
What did Imam Khamenei say about the Zionist regime's situation due to the Al-Aqsa Flood operation?

Imam Khamenei said that the Zionist regime has become trapped in a corner due to the Al-Aqsa Flood operation and that even though the US and many Western governments continue to support this regime, they too are aware that there is no escape for the occupying regime.
What were the two important features of Operation Al-Aqsa Flood according to Imam Khamenei?
The two important features of Operation Al-Aqsa Flood were fulfilling the significant needs of the region and dealing a decisive blow to the criminal regime.
What was the comprehensive plan devised by the US and Zionist elements for the region?

The comprehensive plan devised by the US and Zionist elements aimed to reshape regional relations and dynamics, establish relations between the Zionist regime and regional governments based on the wishes of that regime, and allow the Zionist regime to attain domination over the politics and economy of the entire region of West Asia, as well as over the entire Islamic world.
How did the Al-Aqsa Flood operation disrupt the Zionist regime's comprehensive plan?

The Al-Aqsa Flood operation disrupted the Zionist regime's comprehensive plan to dominate the politics and economy of the entire region of West Asia in such a way that considering the events of the past eight months, there is no hope that they will be able to revive this plan.
What did Imam Khamenei attribute the unprecedented crimes and boundless brutality of the Zionist regime to?

Imam Khamenei attributed the unprecedented crimes and boundless brutality of the Zionist regime, as well as the US government's support for these atrocities, to agitated reactions towards the disruption of the grand international conspiracy that planned to allow the Zionist regime dominate the region.
What did Imam Khamenei say about the surge in reverse migration in the occupied territories?

Imam Khamenei referenced the words of a Zionist security analyst who said, 'If the content of the discussions and conflicts going on between Israeli officials are published by the media, four million people will leave Israel.'
How has the Palestinian issue transformed into a global priority according to Imam Khamenei?

The Palestinian issue has transformed into a global priority with widespread anti-Zionist demonstrations in London, Paris, and US universities, emphasizing the increasing awareness and attention to the plight of the Palestinian people. Imam Khamenei noted that in the light of the Al-Aqsa Flood operation and the resilience of the people of Gaza, Palestine is now at the forefront of global issues.
What did Imam Khamenei say about the sufferings of the people of Gaza?

Imam Khamenei remarked that the sufferings of the people of Gaza, including the martyrdom of approximately 40 thousand people and the killing of about 15 thousand children, babies and infants, are a heavy price that the Palestinian nation is paying in their struggle for liberation from the oppression of the Zionists. He praised the people of Gaza for their unwavering resilience and defense of their Resistance fighters, attributing it to their strong faith in Islam and the teachings of the Quran.
What did Imam Khamenei say about the Zionist regime's miscalculation regarding the capabilities of the great Resistance Front?

Imam Khamenei remarked that the miscalculation of the Zionist regime regarding the capabilities of the great Resistance Front led to the regime’s current dead end. The Zionist regime, he noted, will suffer these continuous defeats one after another. And with God’s power and strength, it will never find a way to save itself.
What did Imam Khamenei say about the Zionist regime's future?

Imam Khamenei stated that despite the West's propaganda, the Zionist regime is gradually melting before the eyes of the people of the world. It is coming to an end. In addition to the nations, many world politicians, and even the Zionists, have recognized this reality.
Who did Imam Khamenei discuss in the second part of his speech?
In the second part of his speech, Imam Khamenei discussed the martyrdom of the late Iranian President Ebrahim Raisi and his entourage, who passed away in a tragic helicopter crash last month.
What did Imam Khamenei say about the late Iranian President Ebrahim Raisi?

Imam Khamenei noted that everyone acknowledged that Ebrahim Raisi was a man of action, service, and honesty. He set a new standard in the field of service which had never been seen before at this level, volume, and quality. His sincerity and hard work were unparalleled among those serving the country.
What were some of the notable qualities of Martyr Raisi according to Imam Khamenei?

Martyr Raisi's notable qualities included his dynamic and successful foreign policy, his skill in seizing opportunities, and his success in raising Iran's profile among world leaders. Additionally, he had a clear demarcation from the enemies and opponents of the Revolution and distrust of the enemy's smiles.
What did Imam Khamenei say about Martyr Amir-Abdollahian?

Imam Khamenei praised late Iranian Foreign Minister, Martyr Amir-Abdollahian, as an active, hard-working, innovative, and skilled, intelligent negotiator who adhered to the principles of the Islamic Republic.
What did Imam Khamenei say about the funeral processions and farewell ceremonies of the 'Martyrs of Service'?

Imam Khamenei praised the million-strong turnout of people at the funeral processions and farewell ceremonies of the 'Martyrs of Service' as a remarkable and noteworthy event, praising it as an example of the Iranian nation's epic-making in the face of bitter and difficult events throughout the history of the Revolution.
What did Imam Khamenei say about the Iranian nation's response to adversity?
Imam Khamenei remarked that the Iranian nation is a motivated, resilient, and enduring people who will not be defeated by adversity; rather, their resolve and determination will only grow stronger.
What did Imam Khamenei say about the upcoming presidential elections in Iran?

Imam Khamenei considered the upcoming presidential elections in Iran as a momentous undertaking and a highly rewarding phenomenon. He stated that if these elections are conducted properly and with great splendor and magnificence, it will be a significant achievement for the Iranian nation and it will resonate powerfully throughout the world.
What kind of president does the Iranian nation require according to Imam Khamenei?

The Iranian nation requires an active, hardworking, knowledgeable, and principled president who believes in the principles of the Revolution in order to safeguard their interests and solidify their strategic depth in complex international equations.
How did Imam Khamenei describe the people's epic participation in the elections?
Imam Khamenei underscored that the people's epic participation in the elections will complete their epic farewell to the martyrs and serve as an adjunct to their epic farewell to the martyrs.
What was the date of the televised speech by Imam Khamenei?
The televised speech by Imam Khamenei was on June 3, 2024.
What was the occasion for Imam Khamenei's speech?
Imam Khamenei's speech was on the occasion of the 35th anniversary of Imam Khomeini’s demise.
Where was the ceremony held for Imam Khamenei's speech?
The ceremony was held in the Mausoleum of Imam Khomeini.
What did Imam Khamenei emphasize about the Palestinian issue in his speech?

Imam Khamenei emphasized the importance and prominence of the Palestinian issue in the late Imam Khomeini’s views and approaches. He highlighted that Imam Khomeini had predicted the path ahead for the Palestinian nation, and this insight is gradually being realized.
What was the purpose of the annual gathering according to Imam Khamenei?

The purpose of the annual gathering was to honor Imam Khomeini’s memory and to apply his teachings towards the administration and progress of the country, as well as the realization of the Revolution’s objectives.
What principles did Imam Khamenei mention regarding the Palestinian issue?

Imam Khamenei mentioned the principles of rejecting reliance on so-called peace negotiations, the active participation of the Palestinian people in taking back their rights, and the help of all nations, especially Muslim nations, for the Palestinian people.
What did Imam Khamenei say about the Zionist regime's situation?

Imam Khamenei said that the Zionist regime has become trapped in a corner due to the Al-Aqsa Flood operation, and even though the US and many Western governments continue to support this regime, they too are aware that there is no escape for the occupying regime.
What were the two important features of Operation Al-Aqsa Flood according to Imam Khamenei?
The two important features of Operation Al-Aqsa Flood were fulfilling the significant needs of the region and dealing a decisive blow to the criminal regime.
What was the comprehensive plan devised by the US and Zionist elements?

The comprehensive plan devised by the US, Zionist elements, their followers, and certain governments in the region aimed to reshape regional relations and dynamics. The goal was to establish relations between the Zionist regime and regional governments based on the wishes of that regime, allowing the Zionist regime to dominate the politics and economy of the entire region of West Asia and the Islamic world.
What disrupted the Zionist regime's comprehensive plan?
The Al-Aqsa Flood operation disrupted the Zionist regime's comprehensive plan to dominate the politics and economy of the entire region of West Asia.
What did Imam Khamenei attribute the unprecedented crimes and brutality of the Zionist regime to?

Imam Khamenei attributed the unprecedented crimes and boundless brutality of the Zionist regime, as well as the US government's support for these atrocities, to agitated reactions towards the disruption of the grand international conspiracy that planned to allow the Zionist regime dominate the region.
What did a Zionist security analyst say about the reverse migration in the occupied territories?
A Zionist security analyst said, 'If the content of the discussions and conflicts going on between Israeli officials are published by the media, four million people will leave Israel.'
How did Imam Khamenei describe the transformation of the Palestinian issue?

Imam Khamenei described the transformation of the Palestinian issue into a global priority. He noted the widespread anti-Zionist demonstrations in London, Paris, and US universities, emphasizing the increasing awareness and attention to the plight of the Palestinian people.
What did Imam Khamenei say about the sufferings of the people of Gaza?

Imam Khamenei said that the people of Gaza have suffered greatly, including the martyrdom of approximately 40 thousand people and the killing of about 15 thousand children, babies, and infants. He praised their unwavering resilience and defense of their Resistance fighters, attributing it to their strong faith in Islam and the teachings of the Quran.
What did Imam Khamenei say about the Zionist regime's miscalculation?

Imam Khamenei said that the miscalculation of the Zionist regime regarding the capabilities of the great Resistance Front led to the regime’s current dead end. The Zionist regime will suffer these continuous defeats one after another and will never find a way to save itself.
What did Imam Khamenei say about the future of the Zionist regime?

Imam Khamenei said that the Zionist regime is gradually melting before the eyes of the people of the world. It is coming to an end. In addition to the nations, many world politicians, and even the Zionists, have recognized this reality.
What did Imam Khamenei discuss in the second part of his speech?
In the second part of his speech, Imam Khamenei discussed the martyrdom of the late Iranian President Ebrahim Raisi and his entourage, who passed away in a tragic helicopter crash last month.
What did Imam Khamenei say about the late Iranian President Ebrahim Raisi?

Imam Khamenei said that everyone acknowledged that Ebrahim Raisi was a man of action, service, and honesty. He set a new standard in the field of service which had never been seen before at this level, volume, and quality. His sincerity and hard work were unparalleled among those serving the country.
What other qualities did Imam Khamenei highlight about Martyr Raisi?

Imam Khamenei highlighted Martyr Raisi’s dynamic and successful foreign policy, his skill in seizing opportunities, and his success in raising Iran's profile among world leaders. Additionally, he highlighted Martyr Raisi’s clear demarcation from the enemies and opponents of the Revolution and his distrust of the enemy's smiles as further indicators of his character.
What did Imam Khamenei say about the late Iranian Foreign Minister, Martyr Amir-Abdollahian?

Imam Khamenei praised late Iranian Foreign Minister, Martyr Amir-Abdollahian, as an active, hard-working, innovative, and skilled, intelligent negotiator who adhered to the principles of the Islamic Republic.
What did Imam Khamenei say about the funeral processions and farewell ceremonies of the 'Martyrs of Service'?

Imam Khamenei praised the million-strong turnout of people at the funeral processions and farewell ceremonies of the 'Martyrs of Service' as a remarkable and noteworthy event. He regarded it as an example of the Iranian nation's epic-making in the face of bitter and difficult events throughout the history of the Revolution.
What did Imam Khamenei say about the Iranian nation's resolve and determination?
Imam Khamenei said that the Iranian nation is a motivated, resilient, and enduring people who will not be defeated by adversity; rather, their resolve and determination will only grow stronger.
What did Imam Khamenei say about the people's epic presence at the funeral processions?

Imam Khamenei regarded the people's epic presence as another message of support for the mottos of the Revolution. He stated, 'The late Mr. Raisi was an outspoken advocate of the mottos of the Revolution and he embodied these principles.'
What did Imam Khamenei say about the upcoming presidential elections in Iran?

Imam Khamenei considered the upcoming presidential elections in Iran as a momentous undertaking and a highly rewarding phenomenon. He said, 'If these elections are conducted properly and with great splendor and magnificence, it will be a significant achievement for the Iranian nation and it will resonate powerfully throughout the world.'
What kind of president does the Iranian nation require according to Imam Khamenei?

The Iranian nation requires an active, hardworking, knowledgeable, and principled president who believes in the principles of the Revolution in order to safeguard their interests and solidify their strategic depth in complex international equations.
What did Imam Khamenei say about the people's participation in the elections?

Imam Khamenei underscored that the people's epic participation in the elections will complete their epic farewell to the martyrs. He stated, 'The Iranian nation requires an active, hardworking, knowledgeable, and principled president who believes in the principles of the Islamic Revolution in order to safeguard their interests and solidify their strategic depth in complex international equations.'
